key.name: mode
key.description: Default mode used for window resizing (0 = Normal, 1 = Outline, 2 = Rectangle, 3 = Stretch)

key.name: maximize-vertically
key.summary: Maximize Vertically if screen edge hit
key.description: Maximizes the window vertically if the top or bottom screen edge is hit while resizing

key.name: increase-border-contrast
key.summary: Use a double-border in 'Rectangle' and 'Outline' modes
key.description: Increase the contrast of the border using a lighter color.

key.name: use-desktop-average-color
key.description: Try to use the desktop average color if defined by your DE (overrides custom colors).

key.name: border-color
key.description: Border color used for outline and rectangle resize modes

key.name: fill-color
key.description: Fill color used for rectangle resize mode

key.name: normal-match
key.description: Windows that normal resize should be used for (match)

key.name: outline-match
key.description: Windows that outline resize should be used for (match)

key.name: rectangle-match
key.description: Windows that rectangle resize should be used for (match)

key.name: stretch-match
key.description: Windows that stretch resize should be used for (match)

key.name: resize-from-center-match
key.description: Windows that should be resized from center (match)

key.name: outline-modifier
key.description: Use these bindings to resize with an outline.

key.name: rectangle-modifier
key.description: Use these bindings to resize with an rectangle.

key.name: stretch-modifier
key.description: Use these bindings to resize by stretching.

key.name: centered-modifier
